import ".././styles/GalleryPreview.css"; import picture from ".././assets/featuredevent4.jpg"; import useEmblaCarousel from "embla-carousel-react" import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import Autoplay from 'embla-carousel-autoplay' import ".././styles/NewsAnnouncementsPreview.css" function GalleryPreview() { const [emblaRef, emblaApi] = useEmblaCarousel({ loop: false },) useEffect(() => { if (emblaApi) { console.log(emblaApi.slideNodes()) // Access API } }, [emblaApi]) return (
